Definition at line 308 of file GrTextureMgr.cpp.

void GrTextureMgr::PreContextReset (  ) 

called when the context is recreated ( display mode changes, etc ). This can also be used to force all textures to be destroyed and then recached. This is useful for quality hint changes.

notify all textures of the context reset.

delete the texture if necessary.

notify the texture of the pending reset.
